content.raw:
Hi Maurice,

I was able to detach and reattach several times with my test script.
Note the screw joint will detach if it detects counter rotation of 0.3 radian or 0.3mm of linear displacement away from the standpipe.  Looking at your reattachment video, it looks like a joint might have been formed, but the coupling was pulled away from the standpipe by the rest of the fire hose, destroying the screw joint almost instantaneously.  Try turning the handle clock-wise as soon as the coupling is snapped in place, or changing gravity to (0, 0.1, 0).

John
